name: LEVIN SAMUEL

ideal_referral: My ideal referral is a hotel owner, commercial developer, or institutional head planning a new project or major renovation, where the landscape must add value to the property. A perfect connector for me is an architect or project manager working on such developments.
top_problem_solved: The top problem I solve is wasted outdoor space. Hotels, campuses, and commercial projects often end up with generic, high-maintenance landscapes that don’t create value. I help them design outdoor environments that are functional, memorable, and profitable.

I’ve only just joined, but if this is what the culture is like, I know I’m in the right place.

name: SREEJITH S PILLAI
top_product: CAITS Info Solutions Pvt Ltd Products and Services: 1. Electronic Security Systems: • CCTV Surveillance: Providing advanced video surveillance solutions to monitor and secure premises effectively. • Security Alarms: Installation of reliable alarm systems to detect unauthorized access and enhance safety. • Biometric Systems: Implementing biometric access control solutions for secure entry and identification. 2. AMC & ASC Support: • Annual Maintenance Contracts (AMC): Offering comprehensive maintenance services to ensure the optimal performance of security systems. • After-Sales Support (ASC): Providing ongoing support and troubleshooting for clients post-installation. 3. Consultation Services: • Expert consultation to assess security needs and recommend tailored solutions for various industries. CAITS Building Contracting LLC Products and Services: 1. Electrical Contracting: • Providing electrical installation, maintenance, and repair services for residential, commercial, and industrial projects. 2. IT Contracting: • Offering IT infrastructure setup, including networking, data management, and system integration services. 3. ELV Contracting: • Specializing in Extra Low Voltage (ELV) systems, including structured cabling, fire alarm systems, and building management systems. 4. Project Management: • Comprehensive project management services to ensure timely and efficient execution of contracting projects, from planning to completion. 5. Consultation Services: • Providing expert advice and solutions tailored to meet the specific needs of clients in the construction and contracting sectors.
ideal_referral: For CAITS Info Solutions, my ideal referrals are businesses or organizations in need of electronic security systems, such as colleges, hotels, and corporate offices looking to enhance their security infrastructure with solutions like CCTV, security alarms, and biometric systems. For CAITS Building Contracting LLC, I’m looking to connect with MEP consultants and professionals in the construction industry who are involved in electrical, IT, and ELV contracting projects. Collaborating with them will help us deliver innovative solutions and ensure project success. If you know anyone in these sectors, I would greatly appreciate an introduction. Thank you!
top_problem_solved: At CAITS Info Solutions Pvt Ltd and CAITS Building Contracting LLC, we excel at turning challenges into opportunities for success. CAITS Info Solutions Pvt Ltd: During the recent floods at Cochin International Airport, we swiftly addressed the handling of CCTV-related equipment to ensure operational security. Additionally, throughout the COVID-19 pandemic, we implemented enhanced security measures that effectively protected our customers’ assets and prevented numerous theft attempts. CAITS Building Contracting LLC: We faced a significant challenge with our first project at Dubai British School when the previous contractor abandoned the site. Our dedicated team stepped in and completed the entire scope of work—including electrical installations, low voltage rooms, chillers, and automation systems—in just four months. This not only salvaged the project but also solidified our reputation in the Dubai market. At both CAITS companies, we believe that our proactive approach to problem-solving distinguishes us in the industry. We look forward to connecting with fellow BNI members to share insights and collaborate on future opportunities.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my favorite BNI stories highlights the incredible power of leadership and collaboration. When I joined BNI, I was eager to build a strong network to support my business goals. Through my involvement, I developed my leadership skills and learned to motivate others, creating a collaborative environment where we all thrived. A pivotal moment came when I decided to expand my business into the UAE. This leap was inspired by the connections and insights I gained from my BNI peers. Their encouragement and support were instrumental in navigating the challenges of establishing a business in a new market. Today, my UAE venture is thriving, and I owe much of this success to the foundation built through BNI. This experience has reinforced my belief that with a strong network and a collaborative spirit, we can achieve our dreams and inspire others along the way.

name: VIBIN CHITTIL
top_product: Mutual Funds, SIFs (Specialised Investment Fund), PMS (Portfolio Management Services), AIFs (Alternative Investment Funds) and Private Equity opportunities. Health & Life Insurance assistance
ideal_referral: Anyone who can invest ₹25,000 or more monthly, or make a one-time investment of ₹10 lakh and above — working professionals, business owners, or families looking for smart long-term investments, insurance protection, or retirement planning support.
top_problem_solved: I make investing simple — no jargon, no confusion. Just clear steps to grow money safely and smartly.
my_favourite_bni_story: Through a BNI referral, I met a business owner who had surplus funds sitting idle in his company account. I helped him channel those funds into short-term mutual fund investments — giving him better returns than a savings account while maintaining liquidity for his next business project. It turned into a long-term client relationship built on trust and smart financial planning.
